Constructor Detail

Employee

public Employee(java.lang.String aName,
                int aDep,
                int aYears,
                int aContract)
The only constructor of the employee class.

Parameters:
aName - the name of the new employee
sDep - the department code of the new employee, see 'deps' for valid codes
aYears - number of years in employment
aContract - the ID of the contract type, see 'contracts' for valid codes
